title: Denoising Diffusion Models

definitions.Diffusion: A process of gradually adding noise to a signal or data to create a distribution of possible outcomes.

formulas: No explicit formulas provided in the image.
summary: The slide presents the concept of Denoising Diffusion Models, explaining that it involves the process of adding noise to a signal or data to create a distribution of possible outcomes. The slide includes a visual representation of the diffusion process and a collage of images that may be related to the topic.
